import { Person } from '@material-ui/icons' import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './Header.scss' const Header = () => { const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth) useEffect(() => { console.log(auth) }) return (
Blog App
Home {auth.isAuth && ( <> Posts {/* Hi, {auth.user.name} */} Logout )} {!auth.isAuth && ( <> Singup Login )}
) } export default Header
